articles.description:
RT‚ÄÇPentoshi üêß euroPeng üá™üá∫
A few thoughts about the state of the market leading into the $BTC ETF
Everyone who wanted to sell, has done so.  Stable coins bottomed 3 months ago, and for the first time in 2 years we are actually seeing INFLOWS. Early stage reversal signs.

Pentoshi üêß euroPeng üá™üá∫:‚ÄÇPretty key update today as I've tracked this for some time 
Stable coin bleed stopped as discussed earlier in October, and has not made a new low now in over 3 months. It's even essentially had a very small uptick 
It could be a sign that capital is finally done exiting.‚Ä¶
